014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.Method;
018import java.lang.reflect.Parameter;
019import java.lang.reflect.Type;
020
021import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementCustomizerFactory;
022import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementParameterCustomizer;
023import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.internal.BindFactory;
024
025/**
026 * Standard implementation of {@link ParameterCustomizerFactory} that delegates to
027 * {@link BindFactory#createForParameter(Annotation, Class, Method, Parameter, int, Type)} passing null for Annotation parameter.
028 */
029public class BindParameterCustomizerFactory implements ParameterCustomizerFactory {
030
031    private final SqlStatementCustomizerFactory bindSqlStatementCustomizerFactory = new BindFactory();
032
033    @Override
034    public SqlStatementParameterCustomizer createForParameter(Class<?> sqlObjectType,
035                                                              Method method,
036                                                              Parameter param,
037                                                              int index,
038                                                              Type type) {
039        return bindSqlStatementCustomizerFactory.createForParameter(null, sqlObjectType, method, param, index, type);
040    }
041}
